PROCEDURE CODE
1221
With the agreement of all the parties, the deadlines agreed or set for the continuation of the proceedings may be interrupted. The parties shall inform the liquidating notary in writing.
The most diligent party shall inform the liquidating notary and the other parties in writing of the disappearance of the reason that justified the interruption. Unless all the parties agree otherwise, the new period begins on the day following this notification.
